data: Irwin Shapiro Irwin Shapiro Timken University Professor Research Interests: Radio and radar techniques: applications to astrometry, astrophysics, geophysics, planetary physics, and tests of theories of gravitation; Pre-college and college science education: curriculum development and teacher training. Publications: ADS , astro-ph Fax: (617) 495-7093 Perkin Lab, P-217 Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics 60 Garden Street, MS-51 Cambridge, MA 02138 ishapiro@cfa.harvard.edu p: (617) 495-7300
